page.title: 05 SCHOOL AND BIRDS
page.content: Our school has three houses. Each child belongs to a house. The houses, which are like teams, compete against each other for sport and other activities. Each house has a special name and colour.The colours are red,white and green.They have been taken from the Welsh National Flag. The houses have been given the names of birds found locally.Red house is called Kestrel.The Kestrel reminds us of red blood.White house is called Heron.The Heron is an elegant white bird.Green house is called Mallard because the Mallard duck has beautiful green colours.
